title: [Large-scale] Technology-enhanced Learning System Engineering Design Using Open Educational Scenarios

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental engineering principles, understanding of social systems, and LMS proficiency
context.additional_context: Education for optimizing social systems by combining open-ended scenario design with model-based engineering approaches in smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze an open-ended educational scenario (OPS) model based on QOC methodology and apply it to technology-enhanced learning systems.
Learners can design open-ended learning sessions for real-world cases in the social domain using domain-specific modeling tools.
Learners can iteratively improve educational scenarios by applying an incremental/iterative engineering process.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
